items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with one click. No lock-in contracts.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

items.question: Which platforms do you integrate with?
items.answer: We integrate with Shopify, WooCommerce, Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Kaufland.de, and many more. Custom integrations available on Pro plan.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. We use bank-level encryption (AES-256), GDPR-compliant hosting in Germany, and regular security audits.
